When Wasfia Nazreen was a young girl, she saw a hula hoop. A child from another country was playing with it. The child was visiting Wasfia's country, Bangladesh. Wasfia just watched. In her country, people believed girls should not play with hula hoops. They also believed girls should not ride bikes.

Now, Wasfia is a famous woman. She climbed the seven highest mountains in the world. For example, she climbed Everest and Kilimanjaro. Not many people have done this. She did something special on the top of each mountain. She played with a hula hoop.

She did this for a reason. She wants to help women and girls in her country. She wants them to feel strong and do sports.
